body_html:
@peterjc123 Thank you for your help. But I am still struggling.

So, here we go,

when cuda9.bat was ran, I got
C:\Users\parkj\pytorch-scripts\pytorch\aten\src\ATen\common_with_cwrap.py
1 File(s) copied
The system cannot find the path specified.
So I manually ran
xcopy /Y C:\Users\parkj\pytorch-scripts\pytorch\aten\src\ATen\common_with_cwrap.py tools\shared\cwrap_common.py

And then, I set the msbuild.exe PATH as you suggested, ran setup.py install again and got the following error messages,
https://gist.github.com/dylanthomas/f101a97c8f62027f5264290713e61bcd
[it looks like TH.h couldn' be found... ]

Can you suggest what I can try next... ?

body:
@peterjc123 Thank you for your help.  But I am still struggling.  

So, here we go,

1.
when cuda9.bat was ran, I got 
**C:\Users\parkj\pytorch-scripts\pytorch\aten\src\ATen\common_with_cwrap.py
1 File(s) copied
The system cannot find the path specified.**
So I manually ran
x**copy /Y C:\Users\parkj\pytorch-scripts\pytorch\aten\src\ATen\common_with_cwrap.py tools\shared\cwrap_common.py**


2.
And then, I set the msbuild.exe PATH as you suggested, ran setup.py install again and got the following error messages,
https://gist.github.com/dylanthomas/f101a97c8f62027f5264290713e61bcd
[it looks like TH.h couldn' be found... ]


Can you suggest what I can try next... ?
